title: John Carney (Delaware politician)
added: On March 12, 2020, one day after the first case of COVID-19 was reported in the state, Governor Carney declared a [https://governor.delaware.gov/health-soe/state-of-emergency/ State of Delaware Due to a Public Health Threat State of Emergency for the State of Delaware Due to a Public Health Threat]. He has issued a series of [https://governor.delaware.gov/health-soe/ declarations] in response to the [[COVID-19 pandemic in Delaware]].
